dialogue.text: I tap on Yumi’s name in “my” phone and wait for her to answer.
Uhh...hello?
Hey.
Who the fuck is this?
Your teacher. I’m calling you from my new secret phone number.
Um...congrats?
The fuck you want? Why you callin’ me?
Maybe I just miss you?
And maybe I’ve gotta find someone willin’ to give me one of those lobotomy things so I can forget I ever heard that. Later.
Wait. On a serious note, are you busy right now?
Yeah.
With what? You’re unemployed and don’t have a house.
And you’re a fucking douche nozzle! I’m hanging up now!
Stop whatever it is you’re doing. We need to meet up and continue our conversation from the beach. It’s important and...apparently {i}time{/i}-sensitive.
That was a hilarious pun that you won't understand. But hopefully, you will soon.
Can't. Chinami's got a fever. You want me to leave her alone so I can come talk to {i}you{/i} about my random ass memory issues?
Chinami’s sick?
Yeah. And I’m stuck at {i}your girlfriend’s{/i} house watchin’ her until the mall closes and Chika comes back home.
Great. I’ll meet you there.
The fuck you will! Were you not payin’ attention when I told you Chinami’s sick?! She needs rest!
{i}Is that Chinami’s papa?! The new one, not the one who abandoned her!{/i}
No! It’s the fucking...bank.
{i}Did Chinami’s recent deposit clear?{/i}
I’ll see you soon, Yumi.
Don’t you fucking-
I hang up the phone and begin to make my way over to the second half of town.
Thankfully, I am no longer completely bewildered in terms of my location and am able to make it to the bus stop without any issues at all.
And while I’d normally just bite the bullet and walk there, I’m admittedly a little worried about Chinami and would like to make sure I see her at least one more time before she dies.
I kid, of course. Kind of.
I don’t know.
Maybe Maki’s morbid sense of humor has just rubbed off on me after all the time I spent with her during Makoto's tragic arc.
Regardless, I double check the bus schedule on my new backup phone and take a seat on the bench, waiting patiently for it to arrive and carry me toward my current goal.
Here’s hoping Yumi likes sleepovers.
Hey, I’m here.
Yeah, I can see that! The Hell do you think you are, just walkin’ into somebody else’s house?!
In my defense, it’s not like you didn’t know I was coming.
That doesn’t make it okay! Go back out there and knock or ring the bell like a normal person!
But if I do that, you’ll lock me out.
Tch. Was hopin’ that would work.
On the bright side, I’m glad to have made it before visiting hours ended. How’s the patient?
Chinami, how are you?!
Chinami is fine! Hi, Papa!
Where did you get such a huge privacy curtain? That’s like, straight out of a hospital.
Probably because it {i}is{/i} straight out of a hospital. Shit’s been here longer than I have.
Pretty sure they’ve had it ever since Chinami was born on account of her whole immune thingy.
Chinami used to spend a lot of time behind her safety curtain, but now she only has to use it some- {i}ack!..keh...{/i}
Hey! Go back to sleep! You know you ain’t gonna get any better if you get all excited and sh...and crap.
That really isn’t much better, Yumi.
Chinami is fine! She just swallowed a bug!
Just ignore her. She’ll go back to sleep if we don’t pay any attention.
Is keeping her here okay? Wouldn’t it be better to take her to a hospital or something?
With what money? Tsukasa ain’t paid me yet and you know damn well how much Chika’s got.
I’m sure the Tsukiokas wouldn’t mind fronting the bill if it meant keeping Chinami healthy.
It’s fine. Shit like this ain’t all that uncommon. Just a normal cold or somethin’. I’ve been givin’ her medicine and her fever’s already started to break and whatnot.
Good. It’s not every day I get to see you being responsible. I like this side of you, Yumi.
Only side of you I like is the...one outside of this apartment.
Good one.
Suck my left nut. Why are you even here? What do you want?
I told you on the phone, didn’t I? We need to resume our conversation from the beach.
Probably better off just startin’ from the beginning. Shit confused me so much I can barely even remember what it is we were talkin’ about.
Somethin’ with the last two months, right?
Right. Did you try talking to anyone else about that after I ran off last night?
Only person I have to talk to is Chika and it seemed like everything was pretty fuckin’ normal from her point of view. Meanin’ it’s probably only me who-
Wait! You didn’t give me your fuckin' memory disease, did you?!
Yay! Chinami won’t be alone in the safety curtain! She’ll make room for big sis Yumi right now!
I didn’t give you a {i}disease{/i}, Yumi.
Aww, rats...
But just because you’re not terminally ill doesn’t mean this is something we can ignore.

Well...I guess technically we {i}could{/i} ignore it and it wouldn’t make much of a difference to you. But it would be a big help for me and a couple other people if you could at least listen for a little while.
Okay. So {i}you{/i} want {i}me{/i} to take time out of {i}my{/i} life so that {i}your{/i} life can get better or some shit...while I don’t benefit at all. Am I hearin’ that right?
More or less.
Gotcha.
Welp, you know where the door is.
Yumi, come on. Just hear me out.
Ahhhhh, fine! But the second this gets too friggin’ weird I’m calling Gary!
Great. Thank you — wait, who’s Gary?
I help myself to a pot of coffee left out on the kitchen table and quickly come to understand that this was definitely not made anytime within the last six hours.
You gonna microwave that shit or just pretend it’s drinkable?
I made this bed and I now have to lie in it. But that is beside the point.
Mhm. And the point is?
How do you feel about sleepovers?
Why do you exist?
Actually, it’s funny you should ask because that’s a big part of why I’m here today.
It’s like every single thing you say makes shit ten times more confusing.
Then I’ll fulfill your greatest wish and shut up while you do your best to recollect the last two months of your life.
Looks like we’re both gonna shut the fuck up, then. Cause that’s exactly what I was tryin’ to do ever since you pointed shit out and I’ve got nothin’.
If you know what’s goin’ on with me, fucking spill it. Because all the shit I keep hearin’ about the space between Halloween and Christmas is makin’ my head spin.
Didn’t think much of it at first, but I straight up can’t even picture any of it when I try to. It’s like all that time was just fuckin’...ripped outta my mind or somethin’.
That what it’s like for you too? You know, with all your memory shit.
More or less. Just it’s a lot more than two months for me and I also, occasionally, do things like black out and force myself on teenage girls.
Those “blackouts” have somethin’ to do with it too? That shit ain’t gonna start happenin’ to me next, is it?
I have no idea. And I’m probably not even the right person to lead a conversation like this since I have very little understanding of how {i}anything{/i} works.
But you’re an outlier right now...so I do know that the logical course of action would be trying to figure out {i}why.{/i}
The fuck is an “outlier?”
Something that skews what’s meant to be an average.
For example, if we calculated the mean age of everyone in class, {i}I{/i} would be the outlier since I’m way older than all of you and would force that mean upward.
Good. So you {i}do{/i} understand that. Now think long and hard about why that makes you such a fucking creep.
I have plenty of time to think about how horrible of a person I am. But, for reasons I am mostly incapable of explaining, you might not have equal time to do the same when it comes to this.
Huh? I ain’t gonna, like...die or some shit, am I?
Nothing that serious, no.
Then what? My memories just gonna, like...come back or something?
They might.
I ain’t seein’ what the big deal is, then.
Would you see the “big deal” if I told you those two months may have never even happened in the first place? And that everyone’s memories of it were just false?
Uhh...no. But I {i}would{/i} call you a fucking lunatic.
If everybody’s got memories of those months and it's just you and me who don’t, wouldn’t {i}we{/i} be the ones...in the wrong or whatever?
This is less about who is wrong and who is right and more about {i}why{/i} we’re in the position we’re in.
Isn’t it strange knowing there could be something different about you, Yumi?
Not...really.
I’ve been different my whole fuckin’ life, man. And I’ve been hearin’ all about it since the first time I knocked somebody’s lights out in daycare.
Might’ve wound up a better person if somebody looked after me now and then, but I’m well adjusted to not fitting in already.
This is different, though. This is-
No shit it’s different. This is like, some...borderline supernatural shit.
But if {i}you’ve{/i} got no idea why this is happenin’ and everybody {i}else{/i} is just gonna be weird if we try and talk about it, the Hell’s the point in even trying in the first place?
Can’t say I’d feel the same way if I lost as much time and memory as you, but it’s just two months. And those two months weren’t really all that bad from what I understand.
Wound up back in school, didn’t I? That’s gotta be a plus, right?
Is that what you wanted, though? I thought you were planning on dropping out?
I don’t know. Last I remember, I was still trying to figure shit out.
I’m surprised you’re okay with the universe just deciding things for you, then.
Nobody decided shit for me. The only person who chooses what I’m gonna do is myself.
Then what will you do if this happens again?
What will you do if there’s {i}another{/i} huge leap in time that just sets you on autopilot until you’re eventually spat back out into the world?
Fuck if I know. But as long as I’m not blackin’ out and doin’ shit like-
Maybe that {i}is{/i} what happened in those two months.
Maybe {i}both{/i} of us blacked out and things just...didn’t go as poorly as they could have.
We were together, weren’t we? It’s possible.
One second, everything was normal. Or at least as normal as it {i}could{/i} have been with me admitting all of that stuff about masturbating to you and whatnot-
Stop bringing that up!
And the next second, two months of our lives were gone.
If you’re okay with that happening again, fine. Disregard everything I’m saying and just keep living life the way you always do.
But if you want to take some control back into your {i}own{/i} hands...and don’t want to have any more time taken away from you...why not try and figure this out with me?
The fuck you bein’ all serious for? It’s makin’ me uncomfortable.
'Sides, the Hell can {i}we{/i} do about this in the first place? You might be smart or whatever, but you ain’t a doctor.
No, I’m not. Nor am I whatever type of scientist handles time travel or...even a {i}teacher{/i} most of the time.
But I’m someone who won’t think you’re insane when you want to talk about things you don’t particularly understand.
I don’t know if I can {i}help{/i} you, per se...but I might be able to help you feel a little less alone.
Which is why I need you to sleep at my house.
Of fucking course that’s what it all comes down to. No idea why I let you just keep talkin’ me into a fuckin’ corner for so long.
Hell of a charade, I’ll give ya that much. But if you’re really gonna try and {i}win me over{/i} or whatever-
Sensei? What are you doing here?
B-Better question...what are {i}you{/i} doing here? I thought you had work?
I was able to get somebody to cover for me. Did {i}you{/i} invite Sensei over?
Course not. Dude just fuckin’ waltzed in as if he owned the place.
So...you’re {i}not{/i} having an affair?
Obviously not! No!
Great! Then it should be totally fine if I do this!
Do what? What are-
